data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 6,282 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Phitsanulok, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 6,282 believers in Phitsanulok to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Phitsanulok, Thailand to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Phitsanulok, Thailand to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Lao Krang people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 6,282 believers in Phitsanulok, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Phitsanulok, Thailand, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Phitsanulok, Thailand to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

location.name: Phitsanulok
location.cities_list: Phitsanulok, Bang Krathum, Bang Rakam, Nakhon Thai, Chat Trakan
